channel.title: Need to install Oracle Driver in Redash for Oracle database
channel.description:
Need to install Oracle Driver in Redash for Oracle database
I have added env variable during my installation but it is not working.
export REDASH_ADDITIONAL_QUERY_RUNNERS=redash.query_runner.oracle
I have referred below link:
http://discuss.redash.io/t/configure-oracle-in-redash-help/663/12
Please guide me what other steps are needed

item.title: Need to install Oracle Driver in Redash for Oracle database

item.title: Need to install Oracle Driver in Redash for Oracle database

item.description:
Need to install Oracle Driver in Redash for Oracle database

I have added env variable during my installation but it is not working.

export REDASH_ADDITIONAL_QUERY_RUNNERS=redash.query_runner.oracle

I have referred below link:

Configure Oracle in Redash - Help! Self Hosted Redash Support
Make sure to read the documentation first and I would advise to post your question in the proper thread. Someone has written a good starting point on using python in redash here https://www.ehfeng.com/redash-python-functions/ Thatâ€™s all I can do for you, sorry!
